snippet: Internet companies like Hulu, AOL and Yahoo are holding presentations this week about their plans for original programming.
abstract: Stuart Elliott and Tanzina Vega Advertising column; Internet companies like Hulu, AOL and Yahoo are holding presentations under the banner of Digital Content NewFronts, focusing on creating high-quality, engaging Web series and other programming that can be watched on smartphones and tablets; efforts are clearly borrowing a page from television broadcast networks and cable channels whose upfronts inspired them.

byline.original: By STUART ELLIOTT and TANZINA VEGA

lead_paragraph: Internet companies like Hulu, AOL and Yahoo are holding presentations this week about their plans for original programming.

headline.seo: In the World of Content, Web Follows a Trail Left by TV
headline.main: In the World of Content, Web Follows a Trail Left by TV
headline.print_headline: In the World of Content, Web Follows a Trail Left by TV
